scoreboard.name: NAME
notify.tpinfo: You can toggle thirdperson mode by pressing T button.
notify.cominfo: If you want to use voice chat, press the X button or Enter to open the chatbox.
notify.friendonly: Only your friends can join this lobby, and only via steam friends list.
notify.friendonly2: To make your lobby visible for everyone, you need to go to settings and switch off the only friends lobby option, and then recreate the lobby.
notify.leavechair: Press spacebar to leave the chair!
notify.popcornActions: You picked up Popcorn! Press RMB to throw it or G to drop weapon.
notify.sodaActions: You picked up Soda! Press RMB to throw it or G to drop weapon.
popups.chair: PRESS E TO SIT ON THIS COMFY CHAIR!
popups.popcorn: PRESS E TO PICKUP THIS YUMMY CORN!
popups.soda: PRESS E TO PICKUP THIS JUICY SODA!
